channel.title: Changing client resolution
channel.description:
I've been trying to change my client's resolution for some time now. Currently, I can change the actual window resolution, but the game is still small. Ex: Original resolution is 765x503. [img]http://i.imgur.com/GevtKbP.png[/img]
But I want it to be interchangeable (currently trying 1600x900) [img]http://i.imgur.com/Vi0wEsQ.png[/img] But it just does that.
In GUI.JAVA, I've changed [code] gamePanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(765, 503)); to gamePanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(1600, 900)); [/code]
The server/client is 317 PI (please don't hate.)
I've looked through GUI, RSSocket, RSInterface, RSImageProducer, RSFrame, RSFont, and RSApplet, and searched the whole folder with anything regarding width, height, and resolution. Also, I've googled to no avail.
Could anyone help me with this problem? Thank you in advance, and I apologize if this is the wrong section.
